feed.title: Luke McCrone
feed.subtitle: Luke McCrone - Education researcher, academic, consultant.

entry.title: My first blog post
entry.summary: I started a blog to record my thoughts on education research
entry.content:
This is my first blog post of many.

In the months to come, I plan to record my thoughts as a researcher in the education sector, and as a burgeoning consultant in the field.

Stay tuned!
